title: a) For providing the requisite infrastructure for the increased population, Development Cess at the rate of 7% of the Land Rate as per the ASR of the year of approval of the redevelopment project shall be chargeable for the extra FSI (excluding the fungible compensatory area) granted over and above the normal FSI for the redevelopment schemes
clause_text: a) For providing the requisite infrastructure for the increased population, Development Cess at the rate of 7% of the Land Rate as per the ASR of the year of approval of the redevelopment project shall be chargeable for the extra FSI (excluding the fungible compensatory area) granted over and above the normal FSI for the redevelopment schemes. 5/7th part of the Development Cess levied and collected by MHADA shall be transferred to the Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai for developing necessary offsite infrastructure. Development cess shall be in addition to development charges levied as per section 124 of MR&TP Act 1966.
section: 33(5)Development/Redevelopment of Housing Schemes of Maharashtra Housing & Area Development Authority (MHADA)
